languages.text: Однако конфликт Империума и главы династии фон Валанциус не мог не сказаться на молодом ордене. Часть сестер потребовала от Ардженты отречься от прежне{mf|го|й} предводител{mf|я|ницы}.
Yet the conflict between the Imperium and the head of the von Valancius dynasty could not but affect the young order. Some sisters demanded that Argenta denounce her former commander.
languages.original_text: Однако конфликт Империума и главы династии фон Валанциус не мог не сказаться на молодом ордене. Часть сестер потребовала от Ардженты отречься от прежне{mf|го|й} предводител{mf|я|ницы}.

traits.locale_text: Yet the conflict between the Imperium and the head of the von Valancius dynasty could not but affect the young Order. Some of the sisters demanded that Argenta denounce her former commander.
Yet the conflict between the Imperium and the head of the von Valancius dynasty could not but affect the young Order. Some of the sisters demanded that Argenta denounce her former commander.
Yet the conflict between the Imperium and the head of the von Valancius dynasty could not but affect the young order. Some sisters demanded that Argenta denounce her former commander.
Yet the conflict between the Imperium and the head of the von Valancius dynasty could not but affect the young order. Some sisters demanded that Argenta denounce her former commander.
Yet the conflict between the Imperium and the head of the von Valancius dynasty could not but affect the young order. Some sisters demanded that Argenta denounce her former commander.
Yet the conflict between the Imperium and the head of the von Valancius dynasty could not but affect the young order. Some sisters demanded that Argenta denounce her former commander.

languages.text: 然而，帝国与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝之间的冲突仍然时常影响到这个年轻的修会。一部分修女要求阿洁塔谴责她的前任指挥官。
languages.original_text: Yet the conflict between the Imperium and the head of the von Valancius dynasty could not but affect the young order. Some sisters demanded that Argenta denounce her former commander.

traits.locale_text: 然而，帝国与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝之间的冲突仍然时常影响到这个年轻的修会。一部分修女要求阿洁塔谴责她的前任指挥官。

languages.text: Doch der Konflikt zwischen dem Imperium und dem Kopf der Dynastie derer von Valancius musste sich auch auf den jungen Orden auswirken. Einige Schwester verlangten, dass Argenta {mf|ihrem ehemaligen Kommandanten|ihrer ehemaligen Kommandantin} abschwört.
languages.original_text: Yet the conflict between the Imperium and the head of the von Valancius dynasty could not but affect the young order. Some sisters demanded that Argenta denounce her former commander.

traits.locale_text: Doch der Konflikt zwischen dem Imperium und dem Kopf der Dynastie derer von Valancius musste sich auch auf den jungen Orden auswirken. Einige Schwester verlangten, dass Argenta {mf|ihrem ehemaligen Kommandanten|ihrer ehemaligen Kommandantin} abschwört.

languages.text: Cependant, le conflit entre l'Imperium et {mf|le dirigeant|la dirigeante} de la dynastie von Valancius ne pouvait pas rester sans effet sur l'Ordre. Certaines sœurs exigèrent d'Argenta qu'elle dénonce son {mf|ancien commandant|ancienne commandante}.
languages.original_text: Yet the conflict between the Imperium and the head of the von Valancius dynasty could not but affect the young order. Some sisters demanded that Argenta denounce her former commander.

traits.locale_text: Cependant, le conflit entre l'Imperium et {mf|le dirigeant|la dirigeante} de la dynastie von Valancius ne pouvait pas rester sans effet sur l'Ordre. Certaines sœurs exigèrent d'Argenta qu'elle dénonce son {mf|ancien commandant|ancienne commandante}.

languages.text: Sin embargo, el conflicto entre el Imperium y {mf|el|la} líder de la dinastía von Valancius acabó afectando a la joven orden. Algunas hermanas exigieron a Argenta que rechazara públicamente a su antigu{mf|o|a} comandante.
languages.original_text: Yet the conflict between the Imperium and the head of the von Valancius dynasty could not but affect the young order. Some sisters demanded that Argenta denounce her former commander.

traits.locale_text: Sin embargo, el conflicto entre el Imperium y {mf|el|la} líder de la dinastía von Valancius acabó afectando a la joven orden. Algunas hermanas exigieron a Argenta que rechazara públicamente a su antigu{mf|o|a} comandante.

languages.text: しかし、帝国とフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の当主との対立は、若き騎士団に影響を与えざるを得なかった。数人のシスターは、アルジェンタに元司令官を糾弾することを要求した。
languages.original_text: Yet the conflict between the Imperium and the head of the von Valancius dynasty could not but affect the young order. Some sisters demanded that Argenta denounce her former commander.

traits.locale_text: しかし、帝国とフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の当主との対立は、若き騎士団に影響を与えざるを得なかった。数人のシスターは、アルジェンタに元司令官を糾弾することを要求した。

languages.text: Ancak İmparatorluk ve von Valancius hanedanlığının başı arasındaki çatışma, genç düzeni kaçınılmaz olarak etkiledi. Kimi rahibeler, Argenta'dan eski komutanına karşı olduğunu duyurmasını istedi.
languages.original_text: Yet the conflict between the Imperium and the head of the von Valancius dynasty could not but affect the young order. Some sisters demanded that Argenta denounce her former commander.

traits.locale_text: Ancak İmparatorluk ve von Valancius hanedanlığının başı arasındaki çatışma, genç düzeni kaçınılmaz olarak etkiledi. Bazı rahibeler Argenta'nın, eski komutanının aleyhinde olduğunu ilan etmesini istedi.
